website_summaries.verdict: This isn't the most energy efficient door sweep, but it looks great and is easy to install.
pros: Considering its price point, it has a heavier gauge of aluminum in the frame than you may expect to find
Because the brush door sweep isn't tight against the floor, it's easy to install
Having a brush style of door sweep makes it easier to open and close the door on carpeted areas
cons: If you have to cut the door sweep to a smaller length, the brush fibers may begin falling out

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my rubber door sweep problems.
customer_reviews.text: This was the answer to our problems. The wood deck for our porch was wearing our rubber door sweep off. It would screech and drag each time we opened the door. This sweep was easy to install and so far is keeping the bugs out. I would recommend holding the sweep up and drilling the outside holes, then securing those then drilling the rest. I had it turned around to be as close to the door as possible and when I was securing it the holes then didn’t match up. I used a 3/32 bit for the holes. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Regrettable purchase
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem with this product is that the nylon bristles will fold/twist very easily out of shape. It's designed so that you can slide the bristles out from the rest of the frame. I assume this is so that you can cut them separately from the frame, which I did since I had to cut it down to 34". The big problem for me was that when I tried to slide it back in, all the bristles got mashed up and warped, no matter how careful I tried to be. It's an eyesore, pretty useless now, and will have to be replaced. Still gets a couple stars for value.
customer_reviews.author: Min Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older wood door.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, these brush door sweeps are the ticket. They seal well, last long, and don't get funky like the rubber ones do. Pay extra for these, because they ARE worth it. Take it from an avowed cheapskate: the rubber squeegee-style are no comparison to these. If you have old doors with old-school thresholds, then you want these.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Austin

customer_reviews.title: Installed on door for an extremely slanted floor.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a customer for its flexibility. Floor was extremely slanted and leaves where getting under door. Didnt use it to keep the cold out as I'm not sure how well that would work. But for keeping leaves from getting g blown under door it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was trimmed slightly to accommodate the door and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was trimmed slightly to accommodate the door and for installation. We used ours for a basement storage room door. Very clean look and sturdy bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa A.

customer_reviews.title: Ugly
customer_reviews.text: I installed this brush type door sweep two years ago on a covered screen door and noticed the yellow/brown staining about the last year. Removed sweep yesterday when it was just to ugly to look at and surprised to see the brush insert was rusting because it was made with steel. Dumb, very bumb.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Sturdy, but Won't Entirely Stop Drafts Undrr an Exterior Door.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this at the bottom of an exterior door. The next day there was a Winter Storm with a 22 mph sustained wind. The new brush bottom door seal didn't entirely stop the draft ... although it did substantially reduce the volume of cold air coming into the house from under the door. I plan to get a Frost King Aluminum and Silicone seal to use on the bottom of the exterior door because it has a solid seal. I'll move this one to the bottom of an interior door. This seal would probably stop a draft from a closed garage or unfinished basement; I just don't think it's designed for windy application.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Rothenhoefer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush weather strip!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed 2 of these, great weather strips for $10. Went to buy more, the price just doubled to $20, don't think I'll buy again. Update October 15th : $10 again, bought 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Do not attempt to cut brush assy,  well made
customer_reviews.text: OOPSIE my bad, thought the brush was 2 inches long , no it is the whole assy. well no matter cut and install. Mark the metal moved the brush assy. out of the way cut the aluminum assy. w my dewalt osc. saw w metal cutting blade, easy- peasy, now cut the brush assy the same way!. Wait not so fast!! brush unravel , so stop and bent the brush with pliers to break it. Lets hope it keeps ot the "critter-bugs".
customer_reviews.author: Mr   Fixit of Altus

customer_reviews.title: Good sweep for laundry room
customer_reviews.text: We used the sweep for a laundry room door because of the space under the door. The space allowed cold air in during the winter, and allowed the perfume smells from the detergent and fabric softeners. The sweep did a good job of stopping the cold air and smells. If you are hanging on an interior door, then you may need some anchors designed for this doors. Check out
customer_reviews.author: Irry

customer_reviews.title: Well, It's a Door Sweep...
customer_reviews.text: Six months in and exactly as described and expected. Pinching the bristle wire held everything together except for a few stray bristles when cutting -- as has happened with every other sweep we've used. if unsure on size, one may want to err on the side of caution and add an 1/8th of an inch or so to gap measurements since it's easier to move up (for a less than one inch gap) than to move these down.
customer_reviews.author: mgecko

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the rain out
customer_reviews.text: Frost King SB36W 2" x 36" Extra Aluminum/Brush Door Sweep, White - Bought this for an exterior door which gets a lot of splashing from rain coming off the roof. Had an issue with water seepage under the door whenever it rained, but after installing this door sweep the problem was eliminated. The bristles keep the rain from splashing on the threshold and seeping under the door. Trimming was easy with a hacksaw and a knife to cut the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: CBT

customer_reviews.title: Good door sweep
customer_reviews.text: Note that the bristles are more clear than white so they are translucent enabling light to show through. Next time I will buy the black bristle version since we leave our light on all night and this attracts some bugs. Since I was replacing an old Frost King, I was able to pull the old sweep from the channel and slip the new one in.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Sweep.
customer_reviews.text: I put this up a year ago. No issues what so ever. This keeps the air from escaping from under the door and keeps the BUGS out. That was the main reason I bought it. To close up a very large gap between the kitchen door and laundry room. EASY TO INSTALL and works great. I am going to buy a few more to close up some gaps on my screen door as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the insects out.
customer_reviews.text: I use this door sweep at the bottom of my lanai door. I have a tile floor in the lanai, and the standard solid material door sweeps to not close the routing gaps of the tiles. The brush of this sweep fills those gaps nicely, and it keeps insects out from crawling into my lanai!
customer_reviews.author: Linde

customer_reviews.title: great product and good looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Easy to install. Install it over the weekend. I do need to cut it to fit my door but once cut down to size, its easy to install and looks great against the door. I am not sure how long the brush will last but I do hope it will last a long time. Right now giving it a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: SLim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to uneven door gap.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Needed something to close the slight gap under an exterior door. the floor is slightly out of level so there was a gap on one side of the door. This closed the gap perfectly and easily. the bristles are stiff enough to stop bugs and minimize air leakage while looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t return but would NEVER buy again
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. The screw hardware that this comes with is of horrible durability and quality (Seems plastic). The product itself; does not do what it’s intended to, which is to keep cold air out. The bristles on this product fall off over time. Stay away from this product and use caulk or rubber adhesion strips instead of this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: only received one. (Frost King 2 x 36 SB36)
customer_reviews.text: The sweep itself seems ok and was easy to install. I only received one though the description says 2x, was expecting 2 of them. The screw heads are not centered on several of the screws which makes it a bit challenging to screw them in with a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Keeps little bugs outside
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and keeps little bugs and the tiny lizards/geckos from slipping inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Not only for snow!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to keep bugs from crawling under my screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but does not block air
customer_reviews.text: Does not block air or light. Extremely dissatisfied. Already cut to install but will still be asking for refund. I took a photo once installed to show but no option to leave photo on this item for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Travis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This has greatly reduced the draft from under the door. It was easy to install and eliminated the uneven door problem I had with others like this. I would buy it again and I have re4comended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but need to trim to fit any imperfections in cement
customer_reviews.text: Had to trim the bristles to match curvature of sidewalk. Tough to do. Also bristles can hang up when you open/close the door due to bristles changing direction/slant if you have it to close to ground. May be just as easy to use the old flapper type.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and the drag is reduced. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and the drag is reduced. We needed an alternative to rubber based brushes as we have carpets at the front doors and therefore it needed to be more bendable.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut and stiff bristles make it easy to hold back hair and dirt while grroming dogs used to prevent hair and dirt from blowing into other room.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is meant to do.
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. Works the way it should. I wanted it to prevent smells coming from the hall of smoke and other things. It definitely helps and also dirt and dust get caught in the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Put on outside screen porch doors. It's our fault the doors are not long enough so the sweeps don't go all the way down. I put them as low as they would go. They seem to be exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My screen door sweeps over a bumpy and irregular surface. I was able to trim the nylon brushes with scissors to customize the shape. Door swings easily and provides complete bug & dust barrier when closed. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tena C

customer_reviews.title: Good solid piece of aluminum.
customer_reviews.text: Works great as I’m using it to stop a draft at my basement door. I cut it easily with a hacksaw to fit the door. Hopefully it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward White

customer_reviews.title: Was surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised about the fiber sweep part, but installed it on a dorr to the garage 3 weeks ago and it really seems to keep all the air in and trash out.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old rigid door sweep. Good quality. I had to drill new holes in it to line it up with the storm door it is mounted to.
customer_reviews.author: Mrdsm

customer_reviews.title: Works great for gaps under door and doesn't ruin or move your rug
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for Gap under my door doesn't ruin your rug or move it you can put it at the house you want with a nice sweep at the bottom recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brian's

customer_reviews.title: Good door sweep
customer_reviews.text: Removed carpet and put hardwood in my kids room's... just to keep light and sound down to a minimum but I guess they'll keep spiders and fly out too.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer and applier

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to install. Should pay for itself this winter. Installed over flagstone so had to use a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and perfect fit and mosquitoes can not come in anymore.
customer_reviews.author: henry Briseno

customer_reviews.title: White Coated Aluminum Door Sweep
customer_reviews.text: Use on our white vinyl screen doors. Keeps the crawling bugs out. Looks good. Very easy to install. Trim to fit and attach with included screws.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Doc

customer_reviews.title: Door sweep
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to install. But you should throw away the supplied screws and get some quality ones that will last.
customer_reviews.author: J Snyder

customer_reviews.title: More than horizontal
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to fill the gap on the vertical plane of my garage door. This should now keep the wasps out.
customer_reviews.author: Baz Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Solves a gaping problem
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these for two doors at our church that had a large gap at the bottom truth there were easy to install and have a limited the gap and dirt and trash that were blowing in.
customer_reviews.author: JVD

customer_reviews.title: Axl must
customer_reviews.text: Great price , big thick bristles , just cut to fit the door , crimp the ends , we havent seen a scorpion in our house since we put these on..
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Leaf blocker
customer_reviews.text: After I screened my patio in, it was constantly covered with leaves blowing under my door. The door sweep has solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought them in the fall. Easy to install for the average DYI guy. Work well at keeping the draft down.
customer_reviews.author: Outside The Box

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders, read the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I know, most guys say "what instructions" but when it comes to cutting the bristles, there is a certain way you need to do it. It worked great ... The second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described works good
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described and was able to trim it down to fit the door with no problem. Draft has stopped and hopping this helps in the summer also.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: work great but the brush did seem to move out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these... work great but the brush did seem to move out of the channel after a few swings of the door. Put a small bend in channel and it hasn’t moved
customer_reviews.author: R. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: IF you cut, pinch the end.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut and install. Not as good as I wanted in keeping ticks out.
customer_reviews.author: MeccanoManStan

customer_reviews.title: Cut to fit
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy hardware but once cut to fit and good hardware supplied it works well
customer_reviews.author: Mike Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Quick look .... Even quicker install!
customer_reviews.text: Every need supplied to mount the door sweeps! Mounting time < 10 minutes! Opinion: Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Worked as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Just cut it to size and screw it to the door.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wong

customer_reviews.title: BRUSH WORKS BETTER THEN RUBBER SWEEPS
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY THING I DONT LIKE ABOUT THIS ALUMINUM PROFILE IS THE SIDES ARE OPEN AND LOOK UNFINISHED.
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Boss

customer_reviews.title: worked fine, good price, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: can't beat the price. We cut it to size, screwed it on, voila!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy aluminum frame and fits perfectly on a 36 inch aluminum storm door

customer_reviews.title: screws were not included
customer_reviews.text: label stated screws included, package was not damaged nor torn but no screws included.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised--NOT 2" bristles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it said it was 2x36". It isn't--very disappointed that they have incorrect dimensions listed. Now I have to buy another product.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: The best sweeps I have used.
customer_reviews.text: The sweeps fit the door bottom and do an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me to seal bottom of door to my office at the shop
customer_reviews.author: AMMRLLC

customer_reviews.title: Damaged part
customer_reviews.text: Box was undamaged but the profile was bent out of shape badly.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably-priced... Easy install; quick mod/trim with hack saw... screws are crappy...just replace them with self-tapping sheet metal screws... this was the perfect solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: MontclairBobbyB

customer_reviews.title: High quality with brush closure.
customer_reviews.text: I like this style best since it uses brushes to create the seal and conforms to uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: JD WDC

customer_reviews.title: Nice small door sweep
customer_reviews.text: Nice door sweep. It has 1” of sweep and 1” of mounting flange.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: This door sweep is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This door sweep is very sturdy. It really keeps the doorway clean.
customer_reviews.author: William Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Less Then great
customer_reviews.text: The bristles all bunch up after only a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lindsay Damskov

customer_reviews.title: Nice door sweep - better than rubber
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the rubber door sweep you can buy at Home Depot. Why don't they sell these in stores???
customer_reviews.author: Seabass

customer_reviews.title: It was what I expected, metal with a quality ...
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected, metal with a quality brush. I used tin snips to cut it to size and it took seconds to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look good.
customer_reviews.text: These look good on the door. Hope they will keep out cold air and insects.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after one year
customer_reviews.text: If you mount this on a door that sun shines on, the brush will fall apart. It seems the UV from the sun causes this problem. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for the screen doors where the cement is not flat.
customer_reviews.author: JStewart

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: When we cut it to size all the fibers started sliding out and then we couldn't use it. Wish we could return it for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut to size however you may need to drill an additional screw hole.
customer_reviews.author: thomas harker

customer_reviews.title: very well made and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Lovecthe all white clean finished look on my wood Floors..nice brush survey will keep air in and out also bugs. Easy to install & im a woman 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great door sweeps
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over to find these and was happy to find them on Amazon. They are all installed and working perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my project
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my project. Quality item for what it is and just what I needed to replace the bristle brush around the shifter in my classic car.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Ben

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I needed. Could not find this in my area.
customer_reviews.author: El Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and I'm very happy that I did, they just fit the bill no problem installing them and keep the insects out.

customer_reviews.title: Does not include 2 bars
customer_reviews.text: In the description the product advises 2x36" bars. This is incorrect. Only 1 bar included with purchase. No complaints about the actual product, just the deceiving headline.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it too large but it was a good buy. My fault!

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, Keeps the vermin out. That's all I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well on our barn door type sliding white door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I put it on an outside door leading ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I put it on an outside door leading into my enclosed patio. Keeps the leaves, sticks, and most of the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L Flick

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was terrible
customer_reviews.text: The box was demolished and the door sweep was bent, completely unprotected. Fixed it bc I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning during COVID.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install. It glides easily over the rug we have by the door.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: used for deck screen door, great item, fast standard shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut-to-fit, and very easy to install. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Polycarp

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, cheap screws.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. The supplied screws appear to be on the cheap side. The instructions didn't say what size to drill the holes, so I drilled 3/32" holes for the screws. The first three went in fine, but the fourth screw broke off in the door. Thankfully there was enough screw sticking out to remove it using vice grips. I was able to find stainless steel replacement screws at the local big box DIY store. They seemed to work much better than the screws that came with the product. I also had to trim about a 1/2" off so the sweep would fit my door. I used a 32-TPI hacksaw blade to trim it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach, works perfectly. Has held up through daily wear and tear on main house door.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heflin

customer_reviews.title: garage doors
customer_reviews.text: I have three garage doors need one more to finish.
customer_reviews.author: cindy gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Relatively easy to cut with hack saw.
customer_reviews.author: Inflammable

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but you need to buy other screws to attach it
customer_reviews.text: Quality door sweep. However, they supplied the crappiest, cheapest, low quality screws to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the frogs and anoles out of my pool cage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Paddison

customer_reviews.title: Bring your own mounting screws.
customer_reviews.text: The quality’s of the aluminum frame and sweep are great but the mounting screws are very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very well made for a cheap weatherstrip. Have used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for a cheap weatherstrip. Have used it for a few months and it has held up very well. Seals well on an uneven threshold that used to just tear up the rubber seals in a few weeks. Should have bought this the first time as I have spent a lot more for ones that did not work very well at all. If I need another I will be back.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install, does exactly what it is supposed to do. All parts needed to install are provided. You provide the drill and screwdriver.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very well if your floor is not perfectly level.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut to length. Easy to install. The white colors looks great! It's been in place for a month now and it still looks and functions like new.

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was very easy to attach. Not perfect regarding closing last gap, but I guess it's as good as it gets.

customer_reviews.title: ... remodeling going on in area) but they look of good quality. When ordering them
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed them yet (we have remodeling going on in area) but they look of good quality. When ordering them, the top was white aluminum and the "Brush" bottom was black. They (I ordered 2) came and the brush bottom was white not black. The pic on line showed a black brush bottom. Wife likes the white so I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: D. F. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice but had a flaw
customer_reviews.text: Nice sweep and as described other than the size. The one I received was 36-1/4" wide and had to be trimmed to fit properly.

customer_reviews.text: Can't even install the product, screws stripped immediately. Awful, and a complete waste of money.
